attributes.additional_details: Drug use is a victimless crime and it should not be punished.
attributes.background: We urge the Government to end the failed War on Drugs. It has been unsuccessful in every measurable way. Prohibition is causing enormous social and physical harm in this country and around the world. Drugs are a health problem, not a criminal one.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565329
